pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Custom Taxonomies Based on the NCBI Taxonomy and GBIF Backbone Taxonomy // The NCBI taxonomy is a popular resource for taxonomic studies but it only contains data on species with sequence data whereas the GBIF has a more extensive coverage of extinct species. Taxonbridge is useful for the creation and analysis of custom taxonomies based on the NCBI taxonomy and GBIF backbone taxonomy.
